<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Make unit say given sound. The sound is defined in [[Description.ext#CfgSounds|CfgSounds]]. If the [[Object#Unit|unit]] is a [[Object#Person|person]], it will also perform corresponding lipsync effect provided an appropriate .lip file has been created for this sound.

* A dead or non-existent unit obviously cannot say anything.
* If the camera is not within given range, title is not shown and the sound will not be heard.
* See also [[playSound]] in order to play a sound wherever the [[cameraOn|camera/player]] is.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> [[say]] will mimic either [[say2D]] or [[say3D]] depending on whether it is there executed in a cutscene or in a game scene.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> from [[say]] sound

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> sound: [[String]] - sound classname

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2 </name>=<value> from [[say]] [sound, maxTitlesDistance, speed]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> sound: [[String]] - sound classname

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> maxTitlesDistance: [[Number]] - max distance at which the sound can be heard. Default: 100 m.

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> speed: [[Number]] - (Optional, default 1) pitch of the sound

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> [from, to] [[say]] sound

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> to: [[Object]] - target

</value></part><part><name>p43</name>=<value> sound: [[String]] - sound classname

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s4 </name>=<value> [from, to] [[say]] [sound, maxTitlesDistance, speed]

</value></part><part><name>p61</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound

</value></part><part><name>p62</name>=<value> to: [[Object]] - target
